name: Classic Burger
description: A juicy beef patty topped with lettuce, tomato, onion, and pickles, served on a sesame seed bun.

name: Cheeseburger
description: A classic burger with an added slice of American cheese.

name: Bacon Burger
description: A delicious burger topped with crispy bacon, lettuce, tomato, and mayo.

name: Avocado Turkey Burger
description: A healthier option with a turkey patty, sliced avocado, lettuce, and honey mustard.

name: Veggie Burger
description: A plant-based patty made with a blend of vegetables, served with lettuce, tomato, and vegan mayo.
